(I'm not saying anythings wrong about your samurai stuff, it's just 
that you are calling attention to yourself and your group, basically 
screaming to my group that you are there. You have to rewrite the 
post.)

Starscream

Starscream fell to the ground as the clones converged on him. With 
Inferno's blasts, the mech fluid started pouring out of his shoulder. 
He saw KitKat coming in the distance. Some back up. But then he saw 
the worst thing possible: Megatron had come to fight us himself. He 
was firing at the oncomers! He needed to be stopped. He screamed at 
the Lavacons.

"Get that one over there!  That's Megatron!" He struggled to his 
feet, bleedgin mech fluid, and gazed at Inferno and the clones. He 
organized a plan in his head. This plan should take out all the 
clones, and hopefully take out Inferno himself. He thought for a 
second about telling him to come to their side, but he remembered 
from his studies Inferno's uncontrollable loyalty to the "royalty". 
So he had to go with his plan. He pulled out his grenade launcher, 
and fired one at the farthest drone on the left and one at the 
farthest drone on the right. He was hoping it would kill them, and 
ingure the other two, so they would be right for the plicking. He 
needed to distract Inferno though, so he turned to Jet mode and went 
to ram him head on.
